front.title: Principles for Operation of Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) Registries

abstract.t: This document provides principles for the operation of Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) registries. Note: This is Internet-Draft was developed by the IAB IANA Evolution Program, and it should be discussed on the InternetGovtech@iab.org mail list. See http://www.iab.org/mailman/listinfo/internetgovtech for subscription details.
